standard.description: These are standards to maintain Accessibility.

test.test_name: Card link require titles and arias
test.query_clob:
with aapca as (
        select case
                 when ((lower(trim(link_attributes)) not like '%aria-%'
                        and lower(trim(link_attributes)) not like '%title%')
                        or trim(link_attributes) is null ) then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               region_id,
               region_name,
               application_id,
               link_attributes,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               build_option,
               action_type,
               label,
               action_id,
	             workspace
         from apex_appl_page_card_actions
    )
select aapca.pass_yn,                          
       aapca.application_id, 
       aapca.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapca.last_updated_by,
       aapca.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Card Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title + aria', 
        p0 => coalesce(aapca.label,aapca.action_type), 
        p1 => aapca.application_id,
        p2 => aapca.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Card Action `%0` link is missing title + aria (app %1, page %2, action %3)', 
        p0 => coalesce(aapca.label,aapca.action_type), 
        p1 => aapca.application_id,
        p2 => aapca.page_id,
				p3 => aapca.action_id) issue_title,
       aapca.action_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapca.label,
       aapca.action_type,
			 aapca.workspace
from aapca
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapca.page_id and aap.application_id = aapca.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapca.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapca.application_id
where aapca.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) :  
    The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.
test.fix: Add both a title and an aria-label to the card link. For example : `title="Visit Page 1" aria-label="Visit Page 1"` Â in the Link Attributes field
